General.Name: Tong Oil Tools
General.Description: Tong Petrotech Corp. develops and offers perforation technology services to oilfield customers in China and internationally. It offers composite perforators, downhole tools, directional drilling technology services, and hydraulic fracturing technology services. The company was formerly known as Tong Oil Tools Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tong Petrotech Corp. in June 2019. Tong Petrotech Corp. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Xi'an, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Building A, Life One Center, Xi'an, China, 710065
